scenario_text.value: Ah! That guy’s here!
Huh? Who else is there?
Falcomon and Syakomon?!

Oh, Takuma. There was an unfamiliar face, so
we tried to stop him from running, but...

That squirt has Miu’s talisman! He’s gotta be
a baddie, I just know it!

Thanks, you two. Let’s keep trying to close
in on him.
Aw jeez... What’s with these jerks?

I’ve never seen this monster before.
How about you, Agumon?
Nope, never! Hey, who are you?
Who cares?!
He won’t tell me, Takuma!

All right, never mind your name.
Could you give us what you’re holding?
Not a chance! This belongs to me now!

The people who dropped the things you’re
holding have been really upset without them.
Please give them back!
Hmm, well.... Nah!
There’s nothing that can change your mind?
Nope, not a thing!

Takuma, I don’t think he has any intention of
giving them back!
We’ll take them by force if we have to!
Let’s do this, Agumon!
Yeah! I won’t lose to a meanie like you!
I don’t plan on losing either!
